fulltext:
Nguyễn Trần Anh Tuấn
Graphic Design
PERSONAL STATEMENT
I am a freelance graphic designer for print and web, with a 
portfolio focused on arts, magazine and UX|UI.
I am a dedicated advocate of clean & clear design and have 
a sharp attention to details. I have strong management 
and communication skills. I keep up with latest web/app 
technologies and trends. 
WORK EXPERIENCE
From August 2010 to February 2013
RINGIER VIỆT NAM  
- Graphic Designer
for ELLE VN, ELLEMAN, 
MarryWedding, Women’sHealth.
Prepares final layout by marking 
and pasting up finished copy 
and art.
Completes projects by 
coordinating with outside 
agencies, art services, printers, etc.
Develop the layout and 
production design of magazines, 
newspapers, journals, corporate 
reports, and other publications.
Meet with art directors to 
collaborate on design.
From April 2012 to May 2013
AVIATION MAGAZINE  
- Chief Designer
Develop the layout and pro-
duction design of magazines, 
newspapers, journals, corporate 
reports, and other publications.
Collaborate with printers to select 
type of paper and ink.
From April 2013 to August 2014
FAME MAGAZINE - Art Director
Plans concept by studying 
information and materials.
Illustrates concept by designing 
rough layout of art and copy 
regarding arrangement, size, type 
size and style.
Train and direct staff members 
who develop design concepts into 
art layouts or who prepare layouts 
for printing.
From August 2014 to August 2016
BAZAAR MAG - Graphic Designer
Develop the layout and 
production design of magazines
Meet with art directors to 
collaborate on design.
From Oct 2016 to Apr 2017
MEDIHUB.VN - Creative Manager
Train and direct staff members 
who develop design concepts 
into art layouts or who prepare 
layouts for printing.
Work with editor and creative 
team to concept on advertising 
for clients and their products.
From May 2017 to October 2017
MIA.VN - Design team leader
(seasonal contract)
Recruit, train and direct staff 
members who develop design 
concepts into art layouts or  
who prepare layouts for 
promotion event.
From Nov 2017 to Sep 2018
THEAGENCY.VN - Sr Graphic design
Ensuring satisfaction to 
customers by liaising with them 
to discover their events’ needs.
With an eye for details and ability 
to think deeply about consumer 
journey and how to give them an 
awesome experience.
From Nov 2018 to now
XOONTEC - UX|UI Designer
Gather and evaluate user requirements 
in collaboration with product 
managers and coder.
Develop UI mockups and prototypes 
that clearly illustrate how sites function 
and look like.
MAGAZINE LAYOUT
